A4.text: The first film adaptation of the book was The Wizard of Oz (1925 film), an American silent film directed by Larry Semon.

A5.text: The earliest listed adaptation of the book is The Wizard of Oz (1925 film), an American silent film directed by Larry Semon.

A6.text: The New Wizard of Oz, 1914 silent film written and directed by L. Frank Baum.
